extraction_metadata.notes: Extremely detailed confession without torture. Notable features: 36-year career as witch; seduction motivated by domestic jealousy; extensive catalog of maleficia over decades; involvement of son who later rejected witchcraft after church blessing; devil prevented religious confession; multiple market-based disputes; property and inheritance disputes; sexual relations with devil described; host desecration; weather magic; no appeal to Change de Nancy. This is a comprehensive first-person narrative of alleged witchcraft spanning most of adult life.
